description:

name: Invisible Elements
plugin_instructions:
To use this plugin, follow these steps:

- Add the "Invisible Element" to your page.

- Use the action "Make Element Invisible" to hide the element by its ID.

- Use the action "Make Element Visible" to show the element again when needed. Enjoy!
